items.text: Dogs are like the ultimate best friends! They were the first animals humans ever domesticated, way back over 14,000 years ago!
Thanks to their long history with us, dogs can chow down on all sorts of foods, even those that would puzzle other wild canines!
Some dogs are superstars in their own right! They work with NASA to help keep astronauts safe and sound!
